Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: விழுப்பேற்றின் అஃதொப்பது இல்லையார் மாட்டும்అழுக்காற்றின் అன்மை பெறின்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Amongst all attainable excellences there is none equal to that of being free from envy towords others.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person stands on the summit of a great mountain, having achieved a state of being completely free from envy ('అழுக்காற்றின் అன்மை'). This state is visualized as a brilliant, flawless diamond radiating pure light from their heart.
Layered_Composition.Midground: On all the lesser peaks below them, all other possible excellences and fortunes ('விழுப்பேற்றின்') are displayed as lesser treasures—a king's crown, a sage's scrolls, a hero's sword.
Layered_Composition.Background: It is clear from the composition that the state of non-envy is the highest peak and the most brilliant treasure. There is 'nothing equal to it' ('అஃதொப்பது இல்லை').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Among all the great fortunes and virtues one can attain, the state of being completely free from envy towards anyone is the single, unparalleled, and supreme excellence.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The hierarchy of the mountain peaks is the central metaphor. The non-envious state as a flawless, radiant diamond symbolizes its supreme purity and value. All other achievements are literally beneath it.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The brilliant, pure white light from the diamond of non-envy is the primary light source, casting its supreme glow over all the lesser treasures on the peaks below. The palette is one of supreme, clear, divine light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: An epic, high-angle shot that looks down slightly, confirming the supreme elevation of the non-envious person over all other worldly achievements.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, hyper-realistic, with a majestic mountain vista and a dazzling, crystalline effect for the diamond.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The diamond heart is the radiant, central light source.

Cultural_Anchors: Among fortunes, there is nothing equal (விழுப்பேற்றின் అஃதொப்பது இல்லை)
